This chunk provides an introduction to Panda3D's powerful configuration system, explaining how it can be used to control various aspects of functionality through configuration files or programmatically, and highlights the ability for applications to define custom variables. The section also includes links to related topics such as configuring Panda3D, listing all available config variables, and accessing these variables in a program.

The Configuration File

Panda3D features a powerful configuration system that is used to control many aspects of Panda3D functionality. These configuration variables may be set using a configuration file or programmatically. It is also possible for an application to define and use custom configuration variables.
